page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
{ Crickhowell}is a small market town in the{Usk}valley,south{Powys.}Nearby villages include{Llangattock, {Llangynidr, Bwlch, Cwmdu}and{Tretower.
This quiet part of{Wales}is quite {anglicised}with only a small number being able to speak Welsh.
Population is quite{affluent}with a high proportion of families having two incomes. Many workers{commute}to nearby industrial towns e.g.{Ebbw Vale and{Cwmbran.
The area has undergone rapid post-war {residential}development, mainly of superior quality.
A further impetus to growth was the opening of the{High School}in{1983.
